name: Mazepocalypse
description:
Mazepocalypse is a dot-collecting arcade style game inspired by classics, but with a twist! Instead of getting a GAME OVER when coming into contact with the undead, you'll initiate combat with them! Fight back against the zombies and manage your resources to survive the deadly mazes of Mazepocalypse, alone or with friends!

Mazepocalypse features two modes, both playable with up to four players!

  • Campaign: In this mode, choose from 6 different scenarios to embark on. Each scenario consists of 5 mazes, and ends with a boss fight! Completing scenarios will also unlock text blurbs that tell the story of Mazepocalypse!
  • Arcade: Shoot for the hi-score and survive the time limit during an endless onslaught of enemies in Arcade mode! Collect consecutive dots and defeat enemies without taking damage to build your combo score for better end results!



Officer Reina Heart is responding to a distress call on in the wooded outskirts of Sanport City; a bus has crashed off the road! Upon arriving at the scene, Reina finds the passengers safe but hears news over her radio that a viral outbreak is turning citizens into crazed zombies! All hope is not lost, however, as a safe haven from the impending apocalypse has been set up in the inner city. With the bus totaled, and Reina's police cruiser having inconvenient engine troubles, Reina arms the 7 bus passengers with weaponry from her trunk and vows to lead them to safety on foot...




Mazepocalypse features 8 playable characters, each having their own unique stats and abilities! Find the character that's right for you, whether it be the sharpshooting cop Reina Heart, or the resourceful bus driver Earl Diaz! Each character comes with 2 unlockable costumes, find them and slay undead in style!

Want to know more about each character? Check out our Official Character Guide in the Steam Community!



Mazepocalypse comes with the following features:

  • 6 scenarios
  • 30+ mazes
  • 6 bosses
  • 8 playable characters
  • 16 unlockable alternate costumes
  • 10+ different enemies
